gurmukhi: gvir mhys AO gnys sY shs rsu pUjw kr bynqI bKwnRXo ihq cIq hÍY
transliteration: Gavari Mahays Au Ganays Sai Sahas Rasu , Poojaa Kar Baynatee Bakhaanyo Hit Cheet Hvai ?
translation: O Parbati, Shiv ji, Ganesh Ji, Surya god, I pray and beg you to be kind to me, be my well-wishers.

gurmukhi: pMifq joiqk soiD sgun lgn gH suBw idn swhw ilK dyhu byd nIq hÍY
transliteration: Pandit Jotik Sodhi Sagoun Lagan Graha , Soubhaa Din Saahaa Likh Dayhu Bayd Neet Hvai ?
translation: O Priest, 0 astrologer! tell me of an auspicious day according to vedas.

gurmukhi: sgl kutMb sKI mMgl gwvhu iml cwVhu iqlk qyl mwQy rs rIiq hÍY
transliteration: Sagal Koutanb Sakhee Mangal Gaavahu Mila , Chaarhahu Tilak Tayl Maaday Ras Reeti Hvai ?
translation: O all my relatives and friends! sing wedding songs, put oil in my hair and anoint me with saffron as is the customs in a marriage.

gurmukhi: bydI ric gwNT jor dIjIAY AsIs moih ishjw sMjog mY pRqIq pRIq rIq hÍY ]627]
transliteration: Baydee Rachi Gaantth Jor Deejeeai Asees Mohi , Sihajaa Sanjog Mai Prateet Preet Reet Hvai ?627?
translation: Raise and decorate the Bedi (sacred place where Hindu marriage rites are performed) for my marriage and bless me that I may have full devotion and love for my beloved Lord Husband, when I meet Him.
